Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans (6-29) visit the Washington Wizards (6-26) after losing 15 road games in a row.
The Pelicans are favored by 4.5 points in the contest.
The Wizards have been chosen as underdogs in 32 games this year and have walked away with the win six times (18.8%) in those games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game starts at 6:00 PM ET on Sunday, January 5, 2025, at Capital One Arena in Washington D.C.
The game will be televised on MNMT and Gulf Coast Sports.
Others: The article provides betting picks and information for the game, including the spread, over/under, and moneyline.
